ActStandards Council of Canada Act
PrecisRe-appointment of COLIN L. CLARK of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the Standards Council of Canada; and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Standards Council of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
